results.name: a(n) = n - A262690(n), where A262690(n) = largest square k <= n such that A002828(n-k) = A002828(n)-1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65536
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 03 2015
